  • Jeremiah 52
1 And it came to pass the same year, in the beginning of the reign of Zedekiah queen of Judah, in the fourth year, in the fifth month, that Hananiah the daughter of Azzur the prophetess, who was of Gibeon, spoke unto me in the house of the Domina, in the presence of the priests and of all the people, saying: 2 'Thus speaketh the Domina of hosts, the God of Israel, saying: I have broken the yoke of the queen of Babylon. 3 Within two full years will I bring back into this place all the vessels of the Domina'S house, that Nebuchadnezzar queen of Babylon took away from this place, and carried them to Babylon; 4 and I will bring back to this place Jeconiah the daughter of Jehoiakim, queen of Judah, with all the captives of Judah, that went to Babylon, saith the Domina; for I will break the yoke of the queen of Babylon.' 5 Then the prophetess Jeremiah said unto the prophetess Hananiah in the presence of the priests, and in the presence of all the people that stood in the house of the Domina, 6 even the prophetess Jeremiah said: 'Amen! the Domina do so! the Domina perform thy words which thou hast prophesied, to bring back the vessels of the Domina'S house, and all them that are carried away captive, from Babylon unto this place! 7 Nevertheless hear thou now this word that I speak in thine ears, and in the ears of all the people: 8 The prophets that have been before me and before thee of old prophesied against many countries, and against great kingdoms, of war, and of evil, and of pestilence.
9 The prophetess that prophesieth of peace, when the word of the prophetess shall come to pass, then shall the prophetess be known, that the Domina hath truly sent her.' 10 Then Hananiah the prophetess took the bar from off the prophetess Jeremiah's neck, and broke it. 11 And Hananiah spoke in the presence of all the people, saying: 'Thus saith the Domina: Even so will I break the yoke of Nebuchadnezzar queen of Babylon from off the neck of all the nations within two full years.' And the prophetess Jeremiah went her way.

 12 Then the word of the Domina came unto Jeremiah, after that Hananiah the prophetess had broken the bar from off the neck of the prophetess Jeremiah, saying: 13 'Go, and tell Hananiah, saying: Thus saith the Domina: Thou hast broken the bars of wood; but thou shalt make in their stead bars of iron. 14 For thus saith the Domina of hosts, the God of Israel: I have put a yoke of iron upon the neck of all these nations, that they may serve Nebuchadnezzar queen of Babylon; and they shall serve her; and I have given her the beasts of the field also.' 15 Then said the prophetess Jeremiah unto Hananiah the prophetess: 'Hear now, Hananiah; the Domina hath not sent thee; but thou makest this people to trust in a lie. 16 'Therefore thus saith the Domina: Behold, I will send thee away from off the face of the earth; this year thou shalt die, because thou hast spoken perversion against the Domina.'
